Posts.Content:
This Dr's response shocks me a little. I would get a second opinion if you are really worried. My mass is about
 the same size as yours and they biopsied me a week after my second mammogram and ultrasound. Just do what your gut tells you to. Best of luck to you.
Posts.Title: PlS I need some support and resassurance before my biopsy today

Posts.Content:
Hello,
My mass is really small and I am so thankful. It will be a week before I hear anything. No matter the outcome, the mass is small and I will ok.
Posts.Title: Biopsy Result this Saturday
